src.nn.stn module¶

STN implementation for the PHOCNet. This approach was not followed through and discussed in my thesis. Hence good results, using this STN are not guaranteed.


class src.nn.stn.STN(input_channels=1)[source]¶

Bases: torch.nn.modules.module.Module

A simple STN implementation, that can be used as an initial layer in src.nn.phocnet.STNPHOCNet.

For more information on STNs have a look at Max Jaderbergs paper.

T_theta(theta, size)[source]¶

The grid generator, applied to the regular spatial grid

Parameters

  • theta – parameters of the grid generator (usually provided by the localisation network)

  • size – size of the input feature-map/ image

Returns

generated sampling grid

f_loc(U)[source]¶

The localisation network

Parameters

U – feature map/ image U

Returns

parameters \(\Theta\) for the grid generator

Forward pass of this STN, i.e. transformation of the input image/ map U.

Parameters

U – feature map/ image U

Returns

transformed image

sampler(feature_map, sampling_grid)[source]¶

The sampler

Parameters

  • sampling_grid – sampling grid, used for warping
